definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] a costly material for garments, acc. to Rabb. silk, (so Now:Arch. i. 124); whether this is based on actual tradition is dub. (etym. unknown);—abs. ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 16:13 (‖[[שֵׁשׁ]]), [[מֶָשִׁי]] v:Eze 16:10 (‖ id.) Vid., further Thes Sm Da Berthol. LXX tri/xapta.
